scripts.precommit: npm run generate && git add README.md
scripts.update-readme: echo 'Updating the readme…'; doxie --render < ./tips.json --inject into README.md && echo '…done!'
scripts.update-toc:
echo 'Updating the table of contents…'; doxie --render .doxie.render.toc.js < ./tips.json --append '
' --inject into README.md as toc && echo '…done!'
scripts.generate: npm run update-readme; npm run update-toc
